subject: Re: It not just a box only phenomenon!
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
you know what's even weirder... "looking back on our plan to establish" sounds like it's being said in your voice, frank... i've heard your voice before interviewed online.... that's what's really interesting to me....

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> This is from a foreign language broadcast tonight, I thought it was German,
> but might be Italian.
> 
>  Tune in a foreign language you don't understand, sit the recorder near the
> pseaker, announce you're doing an EVP recording, and rtecord a while. the
> messages are mixed in with the broadcast. Curiously, people that speak that
> language won't hear anything but the original broadcast. I know--nobody hear
> it.
> 
> F-S
>
